articles.content: NewsIndia vice-captain, who has been on the road since the start of 2022, is looking for a break so she can be fit and ready for her national team

articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: ‘They’ve no idea': Pak coach hits back at Inzamam, Akhtar for slamming Rizwan - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Pakistan coach Saqlain Mushtaq has hit back at former cricketers Inzamam-ul-Haq and Shoaib Akhtar for criticising Mohammad Rizwan's knock in the Asia Cup final against Sri Lanka. | Cricket
articles.content: Pakistan endured a tough 23-run defeat against Sri Lanka in the finals of Asia Cup 2022, following which several ex-cricketers lashed out on players, especially the batters for their dismal show. Man… [+2051 chars]
